title: pOTTU vEyaDi penne puNNiyan
sahitya:
pOTTu vEyaDi peNNE puNNiyan kazhalai eNNiyE vADum teNNilaiyAgha en shEdiyai avar kAdilE shenru


anupallavi

  buddhi vanda nAL mudalAi pOdellAm kanavu kaNDu natti bhUmikkum bhAramAi nALum vAzhginrEnenru kAdil


caraNam    uri koNDa veNNaikkum Udum kuzhalishaikkum uLLam paripOnAl bAkki Edenru shollik-kAdil 
azhaittu pOnAn akrUran Arudal shonnAn uttavan pizhaittup-pOnAl inimEl pEccenna pEccenru
